job_history.work_description: Light accounting/bookkeeping, Travel arrangements, Meeting agendas and minutes, Editing/Proofreading, Bidding Administration, Construction Administration, Document Processing, Bidding Administration, Construction Administration, Coordinated with clients, contractors, subconsultants, and internal drafters to help keep projects running smoothly.

Provided full account servicing for the Sears Credit Cards Portfolio via incoming calls, including billing and payment inquiries and disputes, account maintenance, and lost/stolen cards. Consistently met and exceeded quality and sales goals.

Completed monthly billing reports and Branch Manager's Report. Billed over $500,000 monthly to contracting state agencies and clients. Reconciled billing, posted payments to clients' accounts, and prepared deposits. Prepared and approved accounts payable bills. Created documents, spreadsheets, and monthly newsletters; included developing new spreadsheets for A/R and A/P purposes. Completed several processes of payroll. Assisted in planning company functions. Provided support to the area manager, branch manager, and 12 other branches throughout Washington and Oregon. Supervised part-time assistant.

skills.name: Bookkeeping
skills.explanation: Handled various bookkeeping tasks, including monthly billing reports, reconciliations, and accounts payable, across multiple roles, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Involved in light accounting tasks and assisted in payroll processes, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided full account servicing for a large credit card portfolio, consistently meeting and exceeding quality and sales goals, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Created documents, spreadsheets, and newsletters, and developed new spreadsheets for A/R and A/P purposes, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised a part-time assistant and assisted in planning company functions, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated with multiple stakeholders, managed multiple tasks, and consistently met deadlines, suggesting strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with clients, contractors, subconsultants, and internal teams, indicating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Completed several payroll processes, showing a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Involved in some budgeting tasks, but the extent of involvement is unclear, suggesting some practical experience.
